Content: Kinda answering my own question, but in case anyone is interested  - yes you can run k-nomp and s-nomp together. Just make sure the website ports are different and also the cli is listening on a different port too.

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: as far as I can tell, it's a GPU miner using BFG 😕

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content:
they kept "pre-connecting" with `mining.suggest_target` and it was a pure flat value showing
once I nulled `mining.suggest_target`, that's the result
so either the shares math is off or `mining.suggest_target` allows for something funky
(and yes I have tolower)

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004

Author: БОМБ ОН#6902
Content: hi all, let me try to ask here too... i am trying to figure out how exactly to calculate (average) kmd profit based on difficulty and variable hash rate?

Author: БОМБ ОН#6902
Content: currently i am trying to use formula like: `input_hashrate / (current_net_difficulty * 8192) * block_reward * 3600` for hourly calculation, but comparing with some other calculators, my numbers are way too much lower...

Author: БОМБ ОН#6902
Content: this formula is based on zcash and as far as i understood `8192` is some work size on zcash, not sure if that's the same figure for KMD too?

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content:
I'm no miner but if I look at the pirate calc this should be the calculation:

input_hashrate / current_net_difficulty * 3 * 60 * 0.25

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content: input_hashrate / current_net_difficulty * 3 Block Reward * 60 Mins * 0.25 Free for all mining

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content: 75% is reserved for notaries

Author: БОМБ ОН#6902
Content:
@CHMEX thanks for that calculations info, but it seems to me that this is also missing some part here...
```
input_hashrate / current_net_difficulty * 3 Block Reward * 60 Mins * 0.25 Free for all mining
1000/290852329*256*0.25 = 0.00022
```

Author: БОМБ ОН#6902
Content: this is for pirate, therefore 256 block reward

Author: БОМБ ОН#6902
Content: but anyways, if i multiply my result with 3600 seconds, i am nowhere close to what calculator you linked is suggesting (around 5 Pirate for 1ksol)

Author: БОМБ ОН#6902

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: for PIRATE, remove the `* 0.25`

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: for KMD, you `* 0.25` because Notaries create ~75% of the blocks, so you have a "max" of 25% possible
